note: The shinespark really only lasts 125 frames, but this also requires prior access to node 1 (or a wraparound shot) to open the door.
The 75 additional frames are to get back up from node 5 to node 3.
The 125 frames of the spark are charged only once on the assumption Samus can refill at the ship.
In reality, prior access to node 1 (or a wraparound shot at node 3) is needed to open the door.
The shinespark is kept at 125 frames on the assumption Samus can refill at the ship then get back to node 4.

nodes.name: Gauntlet Ledge Junction
nodes.note: Represents the ledge on the way to gauntlet, but on the right side of the bomb blocks.

to.note: This link is only for sparking. All other strats should go 1 -> 7 -> 5 -> 4.
This link is only for sparking. All other strats should go 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 1.
This link is only for sparking. All other strats should go 4 -> 5 -> 1.
This link is only for sparking. All other strats should go 5 -> 4 -> 3.

strats.name: Base
note: This longer runway requires the ability to destroy the respawning bomb blocks.
They can't be tracked as an obstacle because they respawn.
This means going from node 8 to node 1 and using the runway will logically require 2 PBs if no other methods are available, even though it's really doable with 1.

strats.name: Frozen Geemer Alcatraz Escape
strats.note: Supers are for shaking down a Geemer into the hole and freeze it mid-air to act as a platform.

nodes.name: Bottom Left Door from Tourian Escape

strats.name: Base
strats.note: This longer runway requires the bottom bomb wall to be destroyed. The requirements are on the obstacle itself.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: This longer runway requires the bottom bomb wall to be destroyed. The requirements are on the obstacle itself.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Top
strats.note: The Behemoth Spark opens the bomb blocks, making the path passable without bombs.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom
strats.note: The Behemoth Spark opens the bomb blocks, making the path passable without bombs.

strats.name: Climb Moonfall Block Break
strats.note: The bomb blocks can be broken by spinjumping with Screw attack and holding right, if moonfall makes Samus clip through the platform.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: Once the enemies actually spawn, they can be killed with just Power Beam.

locks.note: Unlike the right door, this is locked from game start. Not just when Zebes awakens.

unlockStrats.name: Base

note: Item doesn't spawn until Zebes is awake.
Interestingly, the Chozo also has a scope that observes Samus, like in Blue Brinstar.

locks.note: If no Bombs in inventory, door stays open

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: Killing Bomb Torizo requires only Power Beam, but Bombs are needed for it to activate.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: Technically this also requires opening the wall.

strats.name: Crateria Supers Dead Boyons Quick Charge
note: This is doable without a short charge, but it's essentially harder than the bluesuit jump.
With a quick charge, it can serve as a less scary strat.

strats.name: Crateria Supers BlueSuit Jump
strats.note: Involves charging a spark running left, then getting blue suit running right to jump through the Boyons.

to.note: No strat for getting through the Boyons with a dboost, since it's redundant with the bluesuit jump.
